meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>life</kanji> <kanji>horizon</kanji> is your life, which you're looking out over, all the way to the very end. This is <vocabulary>one's lifetime</vocabulary>, though it could also refer to <vocabulary>one's career</vocabulary>. Basically, at the end of it something dies.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
